name: Plant Stem Cell Retinol Alternative Firming Moisturizer
about: What it is:A retinol-alternative, ultra-nourishing cream that targets current and future visible signs of aging, boosted with a peptide and ceramide blend for firmer-looking skin..Skin Type:Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily.Skincare Concerns:Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Uneven Texture, Loss of Firmness and Elasticity.Formulation:Cream.Highlighted Ingredients:- Retinol Alternative Blend with Bakuchiol and Alfalfa Extract: Visibly smooths the appearance of fine lines, wrinkles, and uneven texture..Ingredient Callouts:This product is vegan, gluten-free, cruelty-free, and comes in recyclable packaging..What Else You Need to Know:Made with five times the active strength of retinol, but gentle enough to use day and night, this cream blends bakuchiol and alfalfa extract with antioxidant-rich au00e7ai-plant stem cells, plumping peptide, and hydrating ceramide to strengthen and protect the skin barrier, without irritation..Clinical Results:In an independent clinical study of 55 retinol users ages 25 to 65, after over a 4-week period of twice-daily use:
ingredients: -Retinol Alternative Blend with Bakuchiol and Alfalfa Extract: Visibly smooths the appearance of fine lines, wrinkles, and uneven texture..-Teff Peptide and Ceramide NP Blend: Visibly tightens, plumps, thoroughly hydrates, and boosts the skin's natural barrier..-Au00e7ai Stem Cell Extract: Defends skin from environmental stress and future signs of aging....Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice*, Glycerin^, Cetearyl Alcohol, Coconut Alkanes, Water/Aqua/Eau, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Oil*, Lactobacillus Ferment, Sorbitan Olivate, Cetearyl Olivate, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter*, Euterpe Oleracea Fruit Extract, Bakuchiol, Rosa Canina Fruit Oil*, Lactobacillus, Ceramide NP, Coco-Caprylate/Caprate, Hydrolyzed Eragrostis Tef Seed Extract, Sclerotium Gum, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Fruit Extract, Potassium Sorbate, Medicago Sativa (Alfalfa) Extract, Eclipta Prostrata Extract, Citric Acid, Melia Azadirachta Leaf Extract, Pelargonium Graveolens Flower Oil, Sodium Phytate, Citrus Aurantium Amara (Bitter Orange) Flower Oil*, Melia Azadirachta Flower Extract, Corallina Officinalis Extract, Sodium Benzoate, Morinda Citrifolia Fruit Extract*, Coccinia Indica Fruit Extract, Tocopherol, Moringa Oleifera Seed Oil, Solanum Melongena (Eggplant) Fruit Extract, Aloe Barbadensis Flower Extract, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Curcuma Longa (Turmeric) Root Extract, Ocimum Basilicum (Basil) Flower/Leaf Extract, Ocimum Sanctum Leaf Extract, Alcohol, Linalool**, Citronellol**, Geraniol**, Limonene**, Farnesol**....*Ingredients from Organic Farming.**From essential oils.^Made using organic ingredients.......The list of ingredients is subject to change, please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Warm a pearl-size portion in your palms. .-Gently massage onto a clean face, neck, and deu0301colletage in the morning and evening after your serum. .-For best results, pair with your KORA Organicsu2019 Plant Stem Cell Retinol Alternative Serum (sold separately)..-Use with the refill pod included (additional pods sold separately)...Recycling Instructions:.-Remove empty pod..-Rinse out any excess product..-Recycle pod and place new refill pod into glass jar..-If you choose not to reuse the jar or refill it with a new pod, discard cap and recycle glass jar.
